fbd5da5ecdd3.actionBody:
key(escape)
# Ensure we are at the top of the column
key(ctrl-up:10)
key(alt-down)
# Toggle 'all' to blank
key(alt-a)
# Focus list
key(tab:4)
# Jump to text
insert(text or "(empty)")
key(space)
# Ok
key(alt-o)

403f6ff827e2.actionBody:
user.vim_command_mode_exterm(":let @+ = getcwd() . '/'\n")
user.vim_normal_mode("{number_small}k0")
user.vim_command_mode(":let @+ .= substitute(strtrans(getline('.')), '\\_s\\{{2,}}', '', 'g')\n")
user.vim_set_insert_mode()
